title: Welcome to Rifan Financindo Berjangka
description:
PT Rifan Financindo Berjangka is one of the top 10 largest and most active futures brokerage firms, conducting transactions on the Jakarta Futures Exchange and the Indonesian Futures Clearing House. The company facilitates clients in commodity futures trading.

Currently, PT Rifan Financindo Berjangka continues to expand, with a network of operational offices spread across major cities across Indonesia. Headquartered in Jakarta (Axa Tower), the company has branch offices in Jakarta, Bandung, Semarang, Solo, Yogyakarta, Surabaya, Medan, Pekanbaru, Palembang, and Balikpapan.s
